General.Name: Pertama Digital Berhad
General.Description: Pertama Digital Berhad, an investment holding company, develops, operates, and maintains mobile messaging and payment applications in Malaysia. It offers eJamin, an online bail solution to give bailors a bail payment experience; MyPay, a platform to facilitate users to review and search for information, as well as online payments; and mySMS, a platform for Government agencies to deliver services through the short message system channel. The company was formerly known as Sinotop Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Pertama Digital Berhad in September 2020. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
